name: Mayor's Assistant
completionText: Congratulations! You completed Mayor's Assistant! The mayor has rewarded you with a copper axe and you learned a thing or two about cutting wood along the way.
Description: The mayor of Teppas has a request for you. You haven't started this quest yet. Talk to the mayor in Teppas to begin.

flags.name: Quest Start
flags.description: The mayor of Teppas has asked you for a favor.

flags.name: Mayor's Request
flags.description: The mayor of Teppas has asked you to make a sign for him.

flags.name: Request Accepted
flags.description: You've agreed to help the mayor of Teppas make a sign.

flags.name: Sign Man's Requirements
flags.description: The sign man has told you what you need to make a sign: 3 white pine logs and some shuniku berries.

flags.name: Sign Received
flags.description: The sign man has given you the sign you asked for. It's not very good...

flags.name: Sign Delivered
flags.description: You gave the sign man's awful sign to the mayor. You completed the quest! The mayor doesn't seem too pleased, though. You've completed the quest!

flags.name: Homemade Sign Delivered
flags.description: You made the sign yourself and gave it to the mayor! He was quite pleased. You've completed the quest!
